title: The Day Before The Draft
description:
Laura, Dan, Marcus, Mina, RC, Miller, and Darlington discuss how do the wide receivers in tomorrow's draft compare to each other, Malik Willis’ project draft position, "Sauce" Gardner vs Stingley Jr., and how this draft’s edge rushers match up. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Positional comparisons and Willis' draft projection
